mace_train_plugin.calculations
==============================

.. py:module:: mace_train_plugin.calculations

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Calculations provided by aiida_diff.

   Register calculations via the "aiida.calculations" entry point in setup.json.



Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   mace_train_plugin.calculations.MaceTrainCalculation


Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   mace_train_plugin.calculations.dataset_list_to_txt


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:function:: dataset_list_to_txt(dataset_list)

   Convert dataset list to xyz file.


.. py:class:: MaceTrainCalculation(*args, **kwargs)

   Bases: :py:obj:`aiida.engine.CalcJob`


   AiiDA calculation plugin wrapping the diff executable.

   Simple AiiDA plugin wrapper for 'diffing' two files.


   .. py:method:: define(spec)
      :classmethod:


      Define inputs and outputs of the calculation.



   .. py:method:: get_builder_from_protocol(**kwargs)
      :classmethod:



   .. py:method:: prepare_for_submission(folder)

      Create input files.

      :param folder: an `aiida.common.folders.Folder` where the plugin should temporarily place all files
          needed by the calculation.
      :return: `aiida.common.datastructures.CalcInfo` instance
